title: Border incident reported near Preah Vihear on 12 Jan 2025
summary: According to Cambodian officials, artillery was exchanged near Preah Vihear; Thai spokespeople stated they responded to an incursion.
actors_involved: Royal Thai Army; Cambodian border forces
source_reliability_notes: Reuters = reputable; Khmer Times = regional outlet; both cite officials
high_risk_reason: War crime accusations and conflicting statements
